0.2.1.name: wordpress/aprsfi-search-widget
0.2.1.description:
This widget places a search box to the APRS.fi website on your site. Use this search box to search the call sign of another Amateur Radio (Ham) operator on APRS.fi.

The following aspects are customizeable:

  • Widget title
  • Initial search value
  • Search button text
The following aspects are not *yet* customizeable:
  • The width of the text input
  • Zoom level

Pressing the search button pops open a new window with the search results.
